section.title: Pattern Commands
section.para: Automatically or manually create pattern descriptions for models.

section.title: clearpatterns
section.para: Delete the pattern description of the current model. It's a good idea to run this command before adding a pattern definition by hand with calls to 'newpattern'.

section.title: createpatterns
section.para: Automatically detect and create the pattern description for the current model.

section.title: getpattern
section.para: Get the named pattern, or pattern with id specified, make it current, returning its reference.
sets the pattern named 'solid' in the current model to be the current pattern, setting its reference in the variable ''p''.
sets the third pattern in the current model as the current pattern.

section.title: listpatterns
section.para: List the patterns in the current model.

section.title: newpattern
section.para: Add a new pattern node to the current model, spanning ''nmols'' molecules of ''natoms'' atoms each, and called ''name''. A reference to the new pattern is returned.
creates a new pattern description of 100 molecules of 3 atoms each named 'water' (i.e. 100 water molecules) in the current model, and returns its reference

section.title: printpatterns
section.para: Prints out the current pattern description of the current model.
